sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer">
    <v-container class="bg-red" style="height: 100%">
      <v-row no-gutters width="100%">
        <v-column class="bg-black">
          <v-list class="">
            <v-list-item
              v-for="(item, index) in items"
              :key="index"
              :value="item"
              :to="item.url"
            >
              <v-list-item-title v-text="item.text"></v-list-item-title>
              <template v-slot:prepend>
                <v-icon :icon="item.icon"></v-icon>
              </template>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-column>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "NavDrawer",
  props: {},
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      items: [
        { text: "home", url: "/", icon: "mdi-home" },
        { text: "about", url: "about", icon: "mdi-home" },
        { text: "Home", url: "home", icon: "mdi-home" },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openDrawer() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer;
    },
  },
};
</script>
